1.0.7.name: wordpress/ink-own-you-content
1.0.7.description:
INK is a new way to own your content. It’s a well know fact, the content you produce can be shared all around the web and in a very large number of ways. One of the most common way is to simply copy the content and paste it wherever we want it to be shared. That’s fair, but there’s one problem; most of the time you don’t get credited for the content you produced and the shared content is given out of context without any way to go back to the origin (your site!)

INK comes in two flavors. The free version which is ad supported and the premium version which costs you 2$/month to remove the ads. Read more here: http://www.no-margin-for-errors.com/projects/ink-own-your-content/
